text: Should There Be a Backdoor to Google’s Secret Algorithm?
translation: Google的秘密算法是否应该有后门？

text: Google may be feeling unprecedented pushback when it comes to its privacy grabs, but its algorithm may be the secret killer
translation: 谷歌在隐私保护方面可能会受到前所未有的反击，但其算法可能是秘密杀手

text: Google has been making more headlines than usual of late, but very little of it has been the kind that occasions money…
translation: Google最近的头条新闻比平时更多，但很少有这种形式能赚钱……

text: (本文翻译自inc. magazine的文章《Should There Be a Backdoor to Google’s Secret Algorithm?》，参考：https://medium.com/inc./should-there-be-a-backdoor-to-googles-secret-algorithm-c2920bcacb23)
translation: （本文翻译自：“ Google的秘密算法应该有后门吗？”，参考：https：//medium.com/inc./should-there-be-a-backdoor-to-googles-secret -algorithm-c2920bcacb23）
